name: Project 4: Insect Mountain (3DFPS)
description:
This is my Project 4: 3D Shooter Final submission for CAS 117 at Michigan State University.

Modifications from Tutorial

  1. Created new Rock, Snow, and Grass/Moss Textures for the mountain setting of the game.
  2. Created a more elaborate Level 1 Map in which the player takes a trail through the mountains and must watch out for insects from above. Technical difficulties prevented the inclusion of a second level in the final build, which was designed to be a maze. This second level actually would have been the first level prior to the mountain.
  3. Created a player death effect that makes a noise and puts up a red cover over the player's field of vision before respawning, instead of just stopping and respawning as happened before.

Created by Catherine Anger

Several assets adapted from Michigan State University and thisusernameis on freesound.org
